archimate:Requirement.name: 4.70.2 Cyber kill chain requirements control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Threat events relating to the complete cyber attack chain should be identified by reviewing early warning systems (e.g. as part of threat intelligence), supplemented by specific activities that include: maintaining effective relationships with groups that are often involved when prepar-ing for and responding to sophisticated, tar-geted cyber attacks using threat intelligence to help identify imminent or actual targeted attacks, and support an effective response examining activity observed on deployed honeypots (e.g. decoy systems that present fake applications and information in order to observe malicious attackers and collect fo-rensic information about their activity) performing analysis of employee behaviour (e.g. as part of an insider threat programme) implementing methods to help identify in-dividuals who have been placed in the or-ganisation to perform unauthorised activi-ties (e.g. developing an insider threat pro-gramme, establishing an insider threat team and monitoring the behaviour of people).
